name: Project M.E.R.G.E.
description:
Our entry for the Godot Wild Jam #13. It is a top-down shooter with the ability to merge with your enemies to gain their abilities for a period of time.

They are coming for you and all you have is a simple gun and your legs to run away.
But as a subject of Project M.E.R.G.E. have the ability to merge and take control of
your enemies and fight them with their own weapons.

Created using Godot 3.2 built from the master branch.

Disclaimer: this is just a prototype performance might vary and there probably is a ton of bugs.
